p: Such activities, should be used along with the current efforts in self-discipline and self-isolation s already in place to reduce the impact and ever growing rate of t infection in this crisis which is paralyzing the economy and having major impacts on the health of the international community at large, beyond imaginable limits. There are, in life, many challenges to overcome but, the present crisis is beyond comprehension, and only by joining forces in a team effort can we turn these challenges into opportunities.
